summary: REQ-5 appears implemented via updating frontend/index.html canonical and og:url to the default Caffeine URL and removing any visible custom-domain redirect script. REQ-6 and REQ-7 cannot be confirmed from the diff summary because the relevant file contents are not shown and the files were not deleted (only modified). The diff also includes substantial unrelated UI/feature work not requested in the BuildRequest.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove the IC custom domain allowlist file for `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` by deleting `frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains` (or ensuring it no longer includes `myrepubicnetwork.web.id` or `www.myrepubicnetwork.web.id`).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff indicates `frontend/public/.well-known/ic-domains` was modified, but the content is not included in the summary, so it's not verifiable that the file was deleted or that it no longer lists the custom domains.

missing_requirements.requirement: Remove custom-domain documentation by deleting `frontend/docs/custom-domain.md` or replacing it with a brief note stating the project uses only `https://myrepublic-tuk.caffeine.xyz` and does not include ICP gateway registration/DNS steps.
missing_requirements.reason: `frontend/docs/custom-domain.md` is shown as modified (not deleted) and its updated contents are not provided, so it cannot be verified that custom-domain instructions were removed or replaced with the required brief note.

hallucinated_features.description: Large-scale frontend feature/UI changes (routing, role-based protections, new profile completion modal workflow, new/changed pages, network visualization, purchase modal text changes, styling/theme overhaul, Tailwind config updates).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to remove custom-domain configuration/canonical behavior and related docs/allowlist; it explicitly says no backend changes required and does not request broad UI/feature redesigns.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed React Query hooks including a mutation to bootstrap default products, and multiple page behaviors relying on default product bootstrapping.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-5/REQ-6/REQ-7; unrelated to removing custom domain configuration.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state update describing business logic and commission scheme changes and revised domain scope.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request updating `project_state.json` or changing business/commission logic; only domain configuration/documentation changes were requested.
